title: LFM - Team Recruiting 5 More Members As Alpha Players/Reserves.
body:
This is a solid Ranked Team expecting to make gold+ with ease and we need reserves so we can play ranked more often, without playing around only 5 peoples times they can be on.
Current Roster Is (and they will comment bellow if you wish to talk to them):
Top: Hammer (Plat 5)
Jungle: Chilllzy (Plat 5)
Mid: Fizz On Bush (Gold 2)
ADC: Me (Unranked due to various reasons including ranked solo not working)
Support: Jesus The Boss (Plat 5)

We are looking for players gold+ (or with a reason why they aren't) to try out for the team. If you make it in you will either be an Alpha Player or a Reserve (With the alpha player being the better player). The only difference is if both are on at the same time the Alpha player will play.

If you wish to try out please reply to this post in the following format and I will add you In game:

Ingame name: <<Your In game Name>>
Role: <<Your Role>>
Current Rank: <<Your Current Rank>>
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): <<Champion,Champion,Champion>>
Skype: <<Yes/No>>
Anything Else You Wish To Mention:

Thanks for your time
EDIT: We are still looking for members!

replies.body: Hello, I'm Jesus the boss. You cant really milk those, but its worth attempting.

Ingame name: Star Wars
Role: Mid
Current Rank: Gold V
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Yasuo, Diana, Veigar
Skype: Yeah
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: Keen

Hi Star Wars, sorry for the late response,
We would be more than happy to try you out.
Please add me on league - I sent a friend request.
Thanks

Ingame name: Istezz
Role: Support / Mid
Current Rank: Gold 5 (100 LP 1 win)
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Mid - Orianna, Syndra and Diana or Ahri | Support - Thresh, Braum and Alistar or Janna
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: I tend to not talk when I'm focusing on the game but will talk if I/we need a gank for if I'm going to make a play.

Ingame name: ThatOnlyNoob
Role: Jungle
Current Rank: Platinum 4
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Diana, Nidalee, Elise
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: Outgoing player looking for a team to earn rewards

Hi ThatOnlyNoob,
We would be more than happy to try you out.
Please add me on league - I sent a friend request.
Thanks
Hey I'm Chilllzy current {{summoner:11}} for this team, if you need anything feel free to ask. Double's orders Keepo.

Ingame name: Sultan
Role: ADC and my second role is support
Current Rank: Gold V
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Jinx, Cait, Corki
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: I was a platinum last season, looking for a serious team to play with and make friends while doing so. My aim is challenger in ranked 5's i dont really care about playing in solo q as much compared to ranked 5's. My main is ADC and as a adc main my support is preety good as well, my top lane is preety good as a shen etc. My champ pool as an adc is preety large i can play nearly all adc champions except for urgot and teemo.
Hi i'm fizz on bush i'm a Mid main, feel free to ask me any questions about the team!
Cause double is complaining to me. I'm Hammer and i like long walks on the beach and banning teemo. If you have any questions feel free to ask me.

Ingame name: Ryuku
Role: jg/mid/adc
Current Rank: Diamond 5
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Jg: Lee Sin, Reksai, Gragas| Mid: Yasuo, Orianna, Ahri| ADC: Jinx, Tristana, Vayne (I play like 12/13 to a great standard)
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: I've been in competitive teams before but I haven't for a while. I can play all junglers to a good extent, my midlane is pretty good but room for improvement (can't play Azir well etc) and my adc is my best role in terms of knowledge and champion pool. I play all 3 of these roles well but in skill I would be ADC>Jungle>Mid

Hi Ryuku,
We would be more than happy to try you out, you sound like you will be the perfect member.
Please add me on league - I sent a friend request.
Thanks
